text: 15.31: Mk 7.37Ana maaŋ mbe mbuim, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe mba thɨri pɨngi gumgi garim, mbe buni nzuaim, mbe mba hari gu bigi kɨzgeregi gumgi garim, mbe hari gu bigi nzerigim, mbe vhɨra mba suira mbatɨgi gumgi, mbe mbe garim, mbe suira ŋkasŋkagim, mbe thiva ruim, mbe mba rɨmgi mbatɨgi gumgi garim, mbe rɨmgi nzerigim, mbe bigi garim, mbe mbe gangiap, mbe ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrve ga mbui. Mbe ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrve ga mbuav, mbe Isreriŋ Fhe Bakɨme, mbe ana zɨ ndi vun kuagi.
